.. _eda-datasets-label:

Exploratory Data Analysis
=========================

.. Note::

    Documentation in progress. Please look at the ML_Nuclear_Data repository for hands-on tutorials on exploring the various datasets.

While Exploratory Data Analysis should be individually performed to get a sense of the data, the ML_Nuclear_Data repository holds various notebooks to help 
you get started. These are not intended to provide a complete exploration of each data. Instead, these demonstrate how to use NucML capabilities to perform 
easy-tasks to facilitate your analysis.

The following notebooks are available:

* `Atomic Mass Evaluation (AME2016) <https://github.com/pedrojrv/ML_Nuclear_Data/blob/master/AME/Notebooks/1_EDA_AME.ipynb>`_
* `XUNDL/RIPL <https://github.com/pedrojrv/ML_Nuclear_Data/blob/master/ENSDF/Notebooks/2_EDA_RIPL.ipynb>`_  
* `EXFOR Feature Exploration <https://github.com/pedrojrv/ML_Nuclear_Data/blob/master/EXFOR/Notebooks/2_EDA_Feature_Visualization.ipynb>`_ 
* `EXFOR Cross Section Visualizations <https://github.com/pedrojrv/ML_Nuclear_Data/blob/master/EXFOR/Notebooks/3_EDA_Cross_Sections.ipynb>`_
